text: Jibun no oshie o, asobi ya tawamure to suru mono to, gense no seikatsu ni azamuka rete iru-sha-tachi wa, hanatte oki nasai. Soshite kaku hito wa sono okonai ni yotte, mizukara hametsu ni ochiru koto o sore de kunkai shi nasai. Arra no soto ni wa, don'na gadian mo torinasu mono mo nai. Subete no daisho o teishutsu shite mo, ukeire rarenaidearou. Korera no mono wa jibun no okonatta koto ni yotte horobi,-nushi o kyohi shita tame ni nietatta yu o nomi, mata tsuretsuna chobatsu o ukerudearou
